scripts.build:infra: cd infraestructura && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.postbuild:infra: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public\infraestructura -ErrorAction Ignore; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force public\infraestructura > $null; robocopy infraestructura\dist public\infraestructura /E"
scripts.deploy:infra: npm run build:infra && npm run postbuild:infra
scripts.copy:kpi: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public\kpi -ErrorAction Ignore; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force public\kpi > $null; robocopy kpi\dist public\kpi *.* /E"
scripts.kpi:dev: npm run build:kpi:dev && npm run copy:kpi
scripts.kpi:prod: npm run build:kpi:prod && npm run copy:kpi
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n KPI,COPY,APP -c magenta,yellow,cyan "npm run kpi:watch" "npm run copy:kpi:watch" "vite"
scripts.build:all: npm run deploy:infra && npm run kpi:prod && npm run build
